channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Tiempo.com
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Tiempo.com

item.title: CVE-2023-0058|2024-08-02T04:54:32.601Z -- unknown -- tiempo.com
item.description: The Tiempo.com WordPress plugin through 0.1.2 does not have CSRF check when creating and editing its shortcode, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack
